casebody.data:
(Republished)

Louise Jacobson, as Executrix of Gunther Jacobson, Deceased, et al., Appellants, v. Freedman & Slater, Inc., Respondent, et al., Defendants.

Judgment reversed and a new trial ordered, with costs to the appellants to abide the event. Opinion by Cox, J. Peek, P. J., dissents and votes to grant judgment to plaintiff Revisa. Settle order on notice. Concur—Breitel, Bastow and Cox, JJ., [Also printed, 286 App. Div. 778.]
